EmailTemplate.name: 17-GEPS-XLE-C0004O-General.Email 4_S Korean PC Case Study
EmailTemplate.subject: OpenStack changes the game for complex conglomerate
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> OpenStack changes the game for a global conglomerate Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
How do you “conglomerate” a private cloud? It’s not as complicated as it sounds.
Read our case study <[[https://pages.nokia.com/9908.Success.With.Shared.Private.Cloud.v2.html?did=d000000000au&utm_campaign=gamechanger&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email&utm_content=email 4a-koreanpccasestudy&utm_term=general]]> to discover how an OpenStack private cloud solution changed the game for a South Korean global conglomerate. This complex organization, with many companies, is benefiting from a new approach to cloud hosting by:
- Strengthening its position as a strategic service provider
- Substantially raising its protection levels
- Leveraging economies of scale.
I hope that you enjoy this case study! Michael Williams
Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia Connect with us © 2018 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
